step.name: file-touch
step.short-description: Changes the modification timestamp of a file

description.para: A c:result element containing the absolute URI of modified file (the c prefix here is bound to the http://www.w3.org/ns/xproc-step namespace).
The URI of the file to change the modification timestamp of.
If set, the file’s modification timestamp is to this value. If absent or empty, the current system date/time is used.
Determines what happens if an error occurs during the operation:

listitem.para: If this option is true (default), an appropriate XProc error is raised.
If this option is false, the step returns a c:error document (see here for more information) on its result port.

summary.para: The step changes the modification timestamp of the file specified in the href option.

description.para: The step changes the modification timestamp of the file specified in the href option. The result port emits a small XML document with only a c:result element, containing the absolute URI of the changed file (the c prefix here is bound to the http://www.w3.org/ns/xproc-step namespace).

detail.para: Relative values for the href option are resolved against the base URI of the element on which this option is specified. In most cases this will be the static base URI of your pipeline (the path where the XProc source containing the is stored).
